forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wind driven heavy rain. High 16C. S winds at 55 to 80 km/h, decreasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 59F. S winds at 35 to 50 mph, decreasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
